Hi, I'm Ollie.

I'm a Front-end Developer, UI craftsman and displaced Northerner currently based in Bristol*.

This is a catalogue of my professional and personal interests, including the obvious web design & development, a smattering of graphic design and fine art type things and probably no shortage of irreverent nonsense speak. That's kind of my thing. That and this sweet stag motif.

*People sure do talk funny down here.
